title: [EurekAlert!] A dominant evolutionary theme emerges to better predict clinical outcomes for cancer (Sun Yat-Sen ...
text: ( Source : Sun Yat-Sen University ) Those 'devolving' toward a more primitive, or embryonic stem cell ( ESC ) state -- have a worse clinical outcome IMAGE : FOR CANCER EVOLUTION , REGARDLESS OF THE ENVIRONMENT, THE PRE-DEFINED FINAL DESTINATION IS
